DOC.brief_summary: Rubidium newly approve nuclear medicine image drug 'tracer ' used look blood flow heart . This tracer give use special pump call 'elution system ' consider investigational . This mean device yet approve Health Canada general use , approve use study . It use routinely hospital since 2010 . The purpose study confirm proper operation pump . It may also help identify area future improvement . The study data may use safety report Ministry Health Health Canada . The study enroll 2,400 patient 6 hospital across Canada . The University Ottawa Heart Institute ( UOHI ) enroll 1,200 patient .
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objectives : To evaluate performance rubidium elution system ( RBES ) manufacture Jubilant DraxImage ( JDI ) ; specifically use constant-activity-rate intravenous infusion rubidium-82 Ruby-Fillâ„¢ generator diagnostic image myocardial perfusion PET . The V3 elution system highly automate , therefore require few manual performance check . Hypotheses : 1 . Performance : system operation use constant-activity infusion adequate achieve : 1. elution activity ( 82Rb ) bias < 5 % ( V2 V3 ) 2. elution activity ( 82Rb ) imprecision < 5 % ( V2 V3 ) 3. elution time interval ( 30 ) bias < 5 % ( V2 ) 4. elution success-rate reliability > 98 % ( failure-rate < 2 % ) ( V2 V3 ) 2 . Daily Quality Assurance : testing procedure adequate document : 1 . Automated generator yield ( 82Rb ) imprecision < 10 % ( V2 ) 2 . Automated generator breakthrough ( 82Sr , 85Sr ) imprecision < 10 % ( V2 V3 ) 3 . Manual generator yield ( 82Rb ) imprecision < 10 % ( V2 ) 4 . Manual generator breakthrough ( 82Sr , 85Sr ) imprecision < 10 % ( V2 ) 3 . Monthly Quality Assurance : testing procedure adequate document : 1 . Dose calibrator non-linearity < 1 % ( V2 V3 ) 2 . Dose calibrator constancy > 99 % ( instability < 1 % ) ( V2 ) 3 . Dose calibrator bias < 10 % ( V2 ) 4 . Peristaltic pump calibration bias < 10 % ( V2 ) 2.2 Secondary Objectives : To evaluate user documentation training reliability : 4 . Installation Ruby-Fill generator Ruby-Set tubing ( V2 V3 ) 5 . Trouble-shooting repair system error ( e.g . high-pressure ) ( V2 V3 ) 2.3 Tertiary Objective : To evaluate patient demographic health status effect system performance
DOC.criteria: All patient present participate nuclear imaging facility Rb82 PET diagnosis and/or risk stratification CAD ( list approve RubyFill product monograph ) , least 18 year age give informed consent consent currently participate Ottawa Health Science Network Research Ethics Board ( OHSNREB ) approve protocol utilize Rb82 PET eligible . Patients contraindication stress radionuclide image include : Severe reactive airway disease ; < 3 day post myocardial infarction ( MI ) acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) presentation ; Unstable crescendo angina ; High grade atrioventricular ( AV ) block ; Severe claustrophobia ; Patients may pregnant exclude .
